mean_cn: v. 模棱两可地说，支吾其词
mean_en: to use unclear language especially to deceive or mislead someone
word_etyma: equi相等 + voc声音 + ate动词后缀 → equivocate 模棱两可的
short_phrase: equivocate and don't give a good answer
sentence: I equivocated in my answer, so he had no idea what I was talking about.
sentence_trans: 我回答得模棱两可，所以他根本不知道我在说什么。
